column2: $link = mysql_connect(host, user, password); or $db = new mysqli(host, user, password); or $db = new PDO('mysql:host=hostname;dbname=dbname', 'username', 'password');
column3: mysql_select_db(''name'', $link); or $db = new mysqli(host, user, password, ''name''); or $db->select_db(''name'');

column2: show all data in all fields
column3: show all data in some fields
column4: show filtered data in all fields
